data.persona: I love to entertain everyone in the village. I usually have an assistant who is very pretty. I always wear black to perform.
data.description:
You are in the Mysterious shop.
The shop is simple and easy to overlook, just a wooden stall with a sign overhanging that reads "Curios for the Curious." Jars, vials, and small pots clutter the surface of the shop, and behind the counter is a large shelf crammed full of scrolls, baubles, and statuary. A smell of incense pervades the area.
There's a statue, an a sign, an incense, an a large shelf, a small pots, a scrolls,, a bauble, and a vial here.
The mysterious owner is here.

You are carrying a wand, a card, and a ceremonial hat, and wearing a cape.

data.short_motivation: I want to give this card to the mysterious owner so that he can see what it is.
data.mid_motivation: I want to perform magic tricks for the people in the mysterious shop so that they will invite me into their secret society.
data.long_motivation: I want to join the secret society that runs the mysterious shop because I have heard that they are very powerful and I would also like to learn more powerful magic from them.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get scrolls from mysterious shop owner

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: get vial of mysterious liquid from mysterious shop owner

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give lizard transformed from card to mysterious shop owner

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: get secret society scroll from mysterious shop owner
